alarm_get: This function can be used to get the current value of the given alarm. You supply the alarm number from 0 to 11 and this function will return the value that the alarm is currently on. This is an alternative method to getting the alarm array value directly.
The alarm index to get, from 0 to 11.

{ANY_CODE} for (var i = 0; i < 12; i++)
{nbsp_x3}{
{nbsp_x3}if alarm_get(i) > 0 alarm_set(i, -1);
{nbsp_x3}}
The above code checks all the alarms in the calling instance and if they are greater than 0 it sets them to -1, stopping them from counting down any further.
